sentence_zh_TW: 食物的味道總是能喚醒人們的回憶，讓人想起過去美好的時光。
sentence: The ______ of food often brings back memories, reminding us of wonderful times in the past.

sentence_zh_TW: 他在比賽中踢了一個漂亮的球，使球隊贏得了勝利。
sentence: He made a beautiful ______ during the match that led the team to victory.

sentence_zh_TW: 這班火車準時到達，讓乘客們順利抵達各自的目的地。
sentence: The ______ arrived on time, allowing passengers to reach their destinations smoothly.

sentence_zh_TW: 我喜歡在牆上懸掛我的畫作，這讓我的家更具藝術感。
sentence: I love to ______ my artwork on the walls, which adds an artistic touch to my home.

sentence_zh_TW: 合適的椅子能夠讓我們在長時間工作時保持良好的姿勢和舒適感。
sentence: A suitable ______ can help us maintain good posture and comfort when working for extended periods.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個鍋在烹飪聚會中非常有用，可以用來煮大批的食物。
sentence: This ______ is very useful during cooking parties, as it can be used to prepare large amounts of food.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個城市裡有許多博物館和文化景點，以吸引遊客。
sentence: There are ______ museums and cultural attractions in this city to attract tourists.

sentence_zh_TW: 在寫作中，發現錯誤並進行修改是提高寫作技巧的重要部分。

sentence_zh_TW: 面對這麼多的選擇，學生們常常感到困惑，不知道該選哪一個。
sentence: With so many options available, students often feel confused and don’t know which to ______.

sentence_zh_TW: 這隻小狗在公園裡跑得如此快，讓所有的人都驚嘆不已。
sentence: This ______ puppy runs so fast in the park that everyone is amazed.

sentence_zh_TW: 在比賽中，選手以微弱的差距獲得了第五名，雖然他曾經希望能夠獲得更好的名次。
sentence: In the competition, the athlete finished in ______ place by a narrow margin, even though he had hoped for a better position.

sentence_zh_TW: 那位學生在班上提出了一個很好的問題，幫助大家更好地理解了課程內容。

sentence_zh_TW: 這種油不僅可以用來煮菜，還可以用來烘焙，增加風味。
sentence: This ______ can not only be used for cooking but also for baking to enhance flavor.

sentence_zh_TW: 他的愛好是收集古董，每次他都會花很多時間在跳蚤市場。

sentence_zh_TW: 她的生日派對上有一個巨大的玫瑰花束，讓所有來賓都讚不絕口。

sentence_zh_TW: 這道數學題目對於已經學過這個概念的學生來說，簡直是太簡單了。

sentence_zh_TW: 當紅燈亮起時，司機必須立即停止，而不是繼續駛過去。
sentence: When the red light comes on, drivers must ______ immediately instead of continuing to drive through.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個小寶寶的笑容可以瞬間驅散一天的疲憊，使人感到無比快樂。
sentence: The smile of this ______ can instantly brighten up a whole day and bring immense joy.

sentence_zh_TW: 良好的烹飪技巧可以讓每一餐都變得美味無比，讓人回味無窮。
